  #include<stdio.h>
    #define ll long long int
    #include<iostream>
    using namespace std;
int main()
{
	ll n,q; cin>>n;  string s;
	cin>>s;
	q=s.length();// --q;
  float j,k,sum=0;
        cin>>j>>k;
        for(ll i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
 
       if(s[i]=='L')
       sum+=j;
       else
       sum-=j;
 
       if(sum>=k ||sum<=(-k))
       {
           cout<<"NO";return 0;
       }
	   }
	   cout<<"YES";
    return 0;
}
